text: Shevardeni (, literally a falcon) is a village in the historical region of Khevi, north-eastern Georgia. It is located on the left bank of the river Tergi. Administratively, it is part of the Kazbegi Municipality in Mtskheta- Mtianeti. Distance to the municipality center Stepantsminda is 23 km. == Sources == * Georgian Soviet Encyclopedia, V. 10, p. 702, Tbilisi, 1986 year. ==References== Category:Kobi Community villages
title: Shevardeni
